msbt.message: Clown fish are a mite skittish, I hear. I'm surprised I can even get THIS close,
Keepin' all them fish moving together is quite a feat, eh?
Something about this sea butterfly looks kinda shifty Nope. I don't trust it.
I'd wager I've been starin' at koi for longer than you've been around. Can't get enough of 'em!
That guppy's tail is flutterin' so fast, my eyes can hardly keep up!
Oh, I bet that betta doesn't mess about. I like the cut of its jib!
My mother wanted me to be a surgeonfish, but I couldn't handle all those years of fish school.
Well, now! A stringfish! Ain't that a sight!
That arapaima looks like it's gettin' all gussied up for a night on the town!
Hey, Napoleonfish! Looks like you took a nasty bump there! Watch your head next time!
It's just waddling along in there, but even that makes the ocean sunfish a better swimmer'n me.
You gotta eat right to get as big as this here whale shark. That means lots of protein and fiber!
Cast your hypnotic spells on someone else, arowana! I ain't no chump!
They call this coelacanth a "living fossil." But they call me that, too, so I don't put much stock in it.
I'd wager this char's got a lot of moxie. My kind of fish!
I wonder if piranhas ever need dentures
This great white shark's eyes tell a tale of years of hard livin'.
With a head that big, a mahi-mahi's gotta be pretty smart, right?
That oarfish is really puttin' its back into it!
This here sturgeon's got a loutish look to it. Don't let your guard down!
This gar is lookin' sharp. Strong spine, got all its teeth Kinda reminds me of a younger me!
How can anyone tell where this hammerhead shark's looking? I feel like I'm going cross-eyed!
Oh! You donated this? Well, that was mighty generous of you, kiddo!
